overview:
Viveâ„¢ originates from the words Viral Vending. It is a cross-platform rewards-based social recommendations service that enables viral word of mouth between friends and other Vive users across platforms.

For example: If you use an Android phone and you recommend a game to a friend who uses an iPhone or an iPad, Vive’s technology can translate the recommendation on-the-fly so that the appropriate version of the game is available to the friend for purchase, allowing the friend to act on that recommendation and virally spread it to other friends on other platforms.

Viveâ€™s cross-platform translation capability bridges the gap between fragmented device platforms, enabling users to share device-specific content links between friends and other Vive users regardless of their associated platforms.

Vive also gives users the freedom to recommend any content, organizes the content for quick access, translates content across fragmented platforms when needed, and rewards active & influential users.
